2022 Winter Games Schedule

The Winter Games will play out over 17 thrilling days in February 2022. Each day, there’s a wide variety of sports and events to choose from. A total of 109 medal events will make up the Winter Games in Beijing, featuring 15 different disciplines in 7 different sports. Take a look at our Winter Games schedule below to plan your ultimate sports travel experience.

When are the Winter Games 2022?

The 2022 Winter Games are scheduled to begin on Friday, February 4, 2022 and conclude on Sunday, February 20, 2022. There are three sports that will have preliminary events prior to the official start of the Games: curling, figure skating, and ice hockey.
